nodes.text: Nerrik was a male criminal in the employ of Sylas Wilkes who was one of fifteen men tasked with guarding a shipment of blasters and a Sith artifact for their boss on Tatooine. However, the artifact drove the group mad, and they fled into the Dune Sea with the blasters and the artifacts. Nerrik tried to turn back about midday on the first day, but was stopped by Haze and forced to continue to at gunpoint. The group discussed what to do with him at nightfall, but they were attacked by Sand People and Nerrik was killed by the natives.
